events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle that occurred on April 30th, 2024. Immediate claim initiation requested.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident as it involves a car collision reported by the insured party yesterday.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage and expedite the investigation process.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and next steps.
Additional documents such as the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and witness statements were requested from the claimant.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including a detailed police report and multiple photographs of car damages.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to determine the cause and liability of the auto collision.
After thorough assessment, the investigation concluded that the accident was caused by the other driver, confirming the policyholderâ€™s claim.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and related expenses has been proposed to the claimant based on estimated damages.
The customer expressed appreciation for the swift handling of the claim and agreed with the settlement terms proposed.
Formal approval of the claim was granted by the claims department, confirming the settlement amount for payment issuance.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the insured party via bank transfer as per the claim agreement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repairs completion.
All documents and records related to the completed auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
